text: Hobart "Hobie" Alter (October 31, 1933 â€“ March 29, 2014) was an American inventor and businessman. He was a pioneer in the surfboard shaping industry. He was the creator of the Hobie Cat catamarans and founder of the Hobie company. He was born in Ontario, California. Alter died on March 29, 2014 in Palm Desert, California from cancer, aged 80. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American inventors Category:Businesspeople from California Category:People from Ontario, California
title: Hobart Alter
